subject: INTERNATIONAL DELIVERING DEPAR
body:
INTERNATIONAL DELIVERING DEPARTMENT
CORPORATE HEADQUARTERS TINUBU SQUARE,
    MARINA LAGOS NIGERIA.
  CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA .
OUR REF: CBN/IRD/CBX/021/09-055/2024.
PRIVATE EMAIL: 
faxroomdepfgn@gmail.com
TELEPHONE NUMBER: +234-8033049613  
 
ATTENTION:UNPAID BENEFICIARY.
 
THIS IS TO OFFICIALLY TO INFORM YOU THAT WE HAVE RECALLED BACK YOUR APPROVED INHERITANCE PAYMENT BEEN FORMER APPROVED WITH OUR LOCAL BANK IN NIGERIA UBA BANK AND HEREBY ADVICE YOU UNDER THIS NEW YEAR 2024 FIRST COME TO FIRST SERVE TO  FILL OUT  THE NEEDFUL  INFORMATION REQUIRED  FOR ONWARD PROCESSING OF YOUR FUND AS YOUR FUND HAS BEEN PROGRAMMED FOR IMMEDIATE TRANSFER BUT DUE TO THE FACT THAT WE ARE HAVING PROBLEM IN DOING SO NOW AND DUE TO ONGOING GLOBAL FINANCIAL CRISES AS WE PREFER TO BE INFORMING YOU THAT YOUR PAYMENT HAS BEEN RE-PROGRAMMED FOR CASH PAYMENT AFTER OUR EXECUTIVE MEETING THIS AFTERNOON THURSDAY 25TH,2024 TO ENABLE YOU RECEIVE YOUR FUNDS AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.
 
 
HOWEVER, BASED ON THE ABOVE INFORMATION, NOTE THAT ALL NEEDED DOCUMENTS GUIDING THE CONSIGNMENT IS RIGHT INSIDE THE BOX FOR SECURITY PURPOSE AND FURTHER ARRANGEMENT HAS BEEN RESCHEDULED FOR THIS OFFICE IN MAKING YOUR PAYMENT THROUGH CASH PAYMENT IN YOUR COUNTRY FOR YOUR BEST INTEREST UNDER FIDUCIARY  DELIVERING OF YOUR BOX (FUND) TO ANY OF YOUR DESIGNATED ADDRESS IN YOUR COUNTRY AND THE AGENT WILL COMMUNICATE WITH YOU ON ARRIVAL.
 
 
BASED ON THE ABOVE, UNDER SPECIAL PROCESSING ARRANGEMENT FOR THE SAFE DELIVERING OF THE BOX TO YOU, YOUR CONSIGNMENT FUND WORTH OF $10.5M (TEN MILLION AND FIVE HUNDRED THOUSAND US  DOLLARS ONLY) WHICH HAVE MARKED 'PERSONAL EFFECTSâ€™ AND DEPOSITED UNDER DIPLOMATIC UNIT AS FAMILY BELONGINGS FOR ONWARD DELIVERY TO YOU ONCE THE DEPOSIT IS BEEN ISSUED ON YOUR BEHALF WITH OWNERSHIP CERTIFICATE OF DEPOSIT TO YOU AS THE LEGAL BENEFICIARY FOR SAFETY CLAIM OF THE CONSIGNMENT ON ARRIVAL OF THE DIPLOMATS IN YOUR COUNTRY AND BE ADVISED TO FILL OUT THE BELOW INFO AND FORWARD IT IMMEDIATELY TO PROCEED AHEAD ONCE WE RECEIVE IT.
 
PLEASE YOU ARE ADVISED TO RECONFIRM THAT INFORMATION BELOW IMMEDIATELY:
 
FULL    NAME:
ADDRESS NO:
DIRECT PHONE NUMBER:
NEAREST AIRPORT:
IDENTIFICATION INFO
:
NOTE YOUR URGENT RESPONDS TO THIS FINAL NOTICE WILL HELP THIS OFFICE TO SERVE YOU BETTER.
 
 
THANKS FOR YOUR COOPERATION AND UNDERSTANDING WHILE WE ARE WAITING.
 
YOURS SINCERELY,
DR. JAMES H. USMAN
DIRECTOR DELIVERING UNIT DEPARTMENT
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA (CBN)

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL DELIVERING DEPAR
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided. Could you please clarify what exactly needs to be filled out in order to proceed with the processing of my fund? I want to make sure I provide the correct information.

Also, could you explain why there is a need for cash payment instead of a regular bank transfer? Is there a specific reason for this change?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: ATTENTION:MR.THOMAS. WAITINF FOR YOUR BEXT REPLY SOONEST.
body:
INTERNATIONAL DELIVERING DEPARTMENT
 CORPORATE HEADQUARTERS ABUJA SQUARE,

OUR REF: CBN/IRD/CBX/021/09/2024.

ATTENTION:MR.THOMAS.


DEAR SIR,


THIS ACKNOWLEDGES THE RECEIPTS OF YOUR DATED EMAIL MESSAGE WITHOUT

US COMMENCE WITH THE DELIVERY PROCESS AS AGREED TO SERVE YOU BETTER.

YOURS SINCERELY,

DR. JAMES H. USMAN

CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA (CBN)U

subject: Re: ATTENTION:MR.THOMAS. WAITINF FOR YOUR BEXT REPLY SOONEST.
body:
Dear Dr. James H. Usman,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the delivery of my box fund. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. I understand that my name is one of the seven approved for cash payment in my country, which sounds convenient.

Before we proceed further, could you please provide me with more details about the necessary information you require from me? I want to ensure that I provide you with the correct and accurate information to avoid any issues during the claim clearance process.

Additionally, could you please explain how the fiduciary agent will handle the delivery of my box to my designated address? I would like to know more about their procedures and how they will ensure the safety of my package.

Thank you once again for your help, and I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Thomas
